question: In the last four years I have developed dark spots under my breasts and in my face (cheeks, forehead, around lips) face areas get darker if exposed to sun.I am a 69 Yr old female. Suffer from rheumatoid arthritis & diabetes. among my medications. Humira, glucophoge XR, starlix, synthroid,lipitor,altace.  Can my medications be the problem?
title: dark spots
